ValidationRule.description: Some fields may not be changed by End Users after a Data Steward has approved the Account. Fields in the formula can only be edited by Data Stewards.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Reviewed_by_Data_Steward__c = TRUE && NOT($Permission.Telia_Data_Steward) && ( ISCHANGED( Name ) || ISCHANGED( BillingAddress ) || ISCHANGED( CVR__c ) || ISCHANGED( ParentId ) || ISCHANGED( Rationale__c ) || ISCHANGED( Segment__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to change the details of this Account. Contact your Data Steward to make changes.
